entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
